message: Something is strange. It feels like I stepped into another world.
The alley is dark and filled with trash. Every other part of this place is pristine. Why would this one alley be abandoned?
As I gape at the sight, I hear something scuttling in the darkness.
But instead of a little blue puffball huddled in the shadows... I find a person.
He's not... dead, is he?
His limbs are so thin and white I can't help but wonder if he's a doll.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Um... Are you... okay?"
Slowly, the man lifts his head.
The moment our eyes meet, a jolt of electricity shoots up my spine.
What the hell?
The man is looking at me.
...Or is he?
His eyes are unfocused, like he's staring through me instead.
But I feel like... like...
...like I've seen him somewhere before.
It's more his eyes than his face. I feel strange looking into them, like they're sucking me in.
I must have seen him somewhere before.
...No. No, it's nothing like that.
It's like...
...like...

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ugh!"
I leap back.
What just happened?
My vision started to dim...
Then I felt a shock... and that's the last thing I remember.
...Wait.
He's gone.
He was there just a moment ago.
Did he vanish into thin air? That's crazy.
I only blacked out for a second. How could he disappear so quickly?

name: 蒼葉
message: "What the..."
Just then, I hear the pitter-patter of little footsteps.
A blue ball of fur approaches from the other end of the alley.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ren!"
He runs up to me as if nothing happened.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey... Where the hell did you go?"

name: 蓮
message: "Nowhere... I had no destination in mind."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh? What's that supposed to mean?"

name: 蓮
message: "I guess you could say... I just felt like it."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You just... felt like it?"
As genuinely relieved as I am to see Ren, I'm not quite sure how to react.
